nfcjlib.core

Class SimpleSCR

  • java.lang.Object
    • nfcjlib.core.SimpleSCR
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DESFireEV1, UltralightC

    public class SimpleSCR
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple smart card reader. Uses the Java Smart Card I/O API which communicates with smart cards using ISO/IEC 7816-4 APDUs.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimpleSCR

        public SimpleSCR()

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public boolean connect()
        Establishes a connection with a card. The first reader found is used.
        Returns:
        true on success

      • disconnect

        public boolean disconnect()
        Disconnect the connection with the card.
        Returns:
        true on success

      • transmit

        public byte[] transmit(byte[] command)
        Send a command to the card and return the response.

        connect() should be called beforehand.

        Parameters:
        command - the command
        Returns:
        the PICC response

      • transmit

        protected javax.smartcardio.ResponseAPDU transmit(javax.smartcardio.CommandAPDU command)
